name: Euryale's Gambit
description:
Euryale's Gambit (EG) is the story of a succubus who goes back in time to the 19th century United States in order to save the future from a dark fate. Join Euryale as she reunites with Spoons, an old friend, as they plan to end the practice of slavery before a divisive, deadly and immensely consequential war sets the future on a path towards destruction.
Euryale's Gambit takes place in a world different than the historic 19th century you were taught in school. In this world, supernatural entities exist including gods, angels, demons and succubi. Euryale will encounter many of these foes as she carries out the plan Spoons came up with. She will have to use her unique talents and succubus skills to overcome her enemies and achieve her objective.Gameplay
EG is a visual novel with choices that affect different scenes as well as Euryale's relationships with others.Features
AI and human voice acting
AI animated 3D images
Environmental effects/animationsContent
900+ 3DCG Images
40+ Animations
90%+ Voiced (AI and Human)
70+ mins of gameplay
